title: Minecraft 基岩版 1.6.1 发布
author: LocusAzzurro
txt_content:
本帖最后由 LocusAzzurro 于 2018-9-17 16:36 编辑 
Minecraft 基岩版是指包括Minecraft 手机版（Android、IOS）、Win10版（VR）、主机版（XboxOne、NS）在内的 使用“基岩引擎”（C++语言）开发的Minecraft 统一版本。
正式版是 Minecraft 基岩版经过一段时间的测试版测试之后得到的稳定版本，也是众多材质、Addon和官方领域服会逐渐跟进的版本。与此同时Google Play、Win10 Store等官方软件商城也会推送次更新。




Bedrock Dedicated Server Alpha Test:
基岩版服务端Alpha内测：

We are releasing an early access alpha of the dedicated server for Minecraft. Download the server binaries at aka.ms/MinecraftBDS for either Windows or Linux and go host your own servers and play with your friends.
我们发布了Minecraft服务端的早期测试版开服包。在aka.ms/MinecraftBDS可下载用于Windows或Linux系统的服务端文件，来开启你自己的服务器和朋友们玩耍。

Make sure to report any issues to bugs.mojang.com/projects/BDS and please give us feedback on feedback.minecraft.net or our official Discord at discord.gg/Minecraft and chat in the #dedicated-server channel.
记得把发现的任何问题提交到 bugs.mojang.com/projects/BDS 中，并在 feedback.minecraft.net 或官方Discord房间 discord.gg/Minecraft 下 #dedicated-server 频道中进行反馈。

更改:

Added a button to clear login credentials if a Microsoft Account sign-in fails on Nintendo Switch增加了Nintendo Switch中微软账号登录失败后清除登录信息的按钮


修复：

Phantoms now definitely swoop down and attack people so watch out! (MCPE-36673)幻翼现在一定会俯冲伤人了，小心！(MCPE-36673)Fixed blocks often disappearing after being placed or reappearing after being destroyed (MCPE-31596)修复了方块在放置后消失或破坏后重现的错误(MCPE-31596)Increased performance on iOS devices增强了在iOS设备中的性能Several fixes to reduce lag in multiplayer games and Realms进行了降低多人游戏和领域延迟的数个修复


附加包：

Updated templates for 1.6.1 with new assets and behaviors can be downloaded from minecraft.net/addons, including fixes to the Phantom's swooping behavior更新了1.6.1版本的模板，添加了新的资源与行为内容，包括对幻翼俯冲行为进行的相关修复，可在minecraft.net/addons下载


文章来源：https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360015779511-Minecraft-1-6-1-Bedrock-


正版地址Google Playhttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mojang.minecraftpeWin10 Storehttps://www.microsoft.com/zh-cn/store/p/minecraft-for-windows-10/9nblggh2jhxj
